alert.note: Alert for Greene; Morgan; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Morgan, northeastern Putnam and central Greene Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Phoenix, or 10 miles northeast of Eatonton, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Union Point, Siloam, Phoenix, Reynolds at Lake Oconee, Liberty, Rockville, Veazey, Parks Mill, Carey and Swords. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
